verses.verse: Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H559>said<s%> to me, and I have <S%H4427>appointed<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you.

"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>here<s%> is the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, but I <S%H2204>am<s%> <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H7867>gray,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> are with you. And I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Here<s%> I am; <S%H6030>bear<s%> <S%H6030>witness<s%> against me <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and His <S%H4899>anointed.<s%> <S%H4310>Whose<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken,<s%> or <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H2543>donkey<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken,<s%> or <S%H4310>whom<s%> have I <S%H6231>defrauded<s%>? <S%H4310>Whom<s%> have I <S%H7533>oppressed,<s%> or from <S%H4310>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H3724>bribe<s%> to <S%H5956>blind<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> with it? I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> [it] to you."
And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have not <S%H6231>defrauded<s%> us, or <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> us, or <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H3972>anything<s%> from <S%H376>any<s%> man's <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H5707>witness<s%> against you, and His <S%H4899>anointed<s%> is <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that you have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "[He is] <S%H5707>witness.<s%>"

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "It is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>appointed<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> your fathers up from the <S%H1>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt.<s%>

"So <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3320>take<s%> your <S%H3320>stand,<s%> that I may <S%H8199>plead<s%> with you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H854>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6666>acts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H6213>did<s%> for you and your fathers.

<S%H9201>"When<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and your fathers <S%H1>cried<s%> out to the <S%H2199>Lord,<s%> then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>sent<s%> <S%H7971>Moses<s%> and <S%H4872>Aaron<s%> who <S%H175>brought<s%> your fathers out of <S%H3318>Egypt<s%> and <S%H1>settled<s%> them in <S%H4714>this<s%> <S%H3427>place.<s%>

"But they <S%H7911>forgot<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> so He <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> against them.

"And they <S%H2199>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> 'We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and have <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> and the <S%H9441>Ashtaroth;<s%> but <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of our <S%H340>enemies,<s%> and we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> Thee.'

"Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> and <S%H917>Bedan<s%> and <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of your <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> so that you <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H983>security.<s%>

"When you <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, you <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H3808>'No,<s%> but a <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us,' although the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> [was] your <S%H4428>king.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H2009>here<s%> is the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> you have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> you have <S%H7592>asked<s%> for, and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you.

<S%H518>"If<s%> you will <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him, and <S%H8085>listen<s%> to His <S%H6963>voice<s%> and not <S%H4784>rebel<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> then <S%H1571>both<s%> you and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4427>reigns<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you will <S%H310>follow<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"And <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> but <S%H4784>rebel<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> then the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be against you, [as it was] against your fathers.

<S%H1571>"Even<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3320>take<s%> your <S%H3320>stand<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

"Is it not the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%>? I will <S%H7121>call<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that He may <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H4306>rain.<s%> Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> that your <S%H9567>wickedness<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H7592>asking<s%> for yourselves a <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H4306>rain<s%> that <S%H3117>day;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H6419>"Pray<s%> for your <S%H5650>servants<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> so that we may not <S%H4191>die,<s%> for we have <S%H3254>added<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H9128>sins<s%> [this] <S%H9567>evil<s%> by <S%H7592>asking<s%> for ourselves a <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "Do not <S%H3372>fear.<s%> You have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9567>evil,<s%> <S%H389>yet<s%> do not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> but <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

"And you must not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside,<s%> for [then you would go] <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8414>futile<s%> <S%H8414>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> can not <S%H3276>profit<s%> or <S%H5337>deliver,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H8414>futile.<s%>

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not <S%H5203>abandon<s%> His <S%H5971>people<s%> on <S%H5668>account<s%> of His <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has been <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H2974><s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H5971>people<s%> for Himself.

<S%H1571>"Moreover,<s%> as for me, <S%H2486>far<s%> be it from me that I should <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H2308>ceasing<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%> for you; but I will <S%H3384>instruct<s%> you in the <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>

<S%H389>"Only<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him in <S%H571>truth<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> for <S%H7200>consider<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H1431>things<s%> He has <S%H1431>done<s%> for you.
"But <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H7489>still<s%> <S%H7489>do<s%> <S%H7489>wickedly,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> you and your <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be <S%H5595>swept<s%> <S%H5595>away.<s%>"
